TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IBindingMulticastCapabilities

Docs.summary: Defines the optional interface that a binding can implement to specify whether the service it configures has multicast capabilities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class has a single property that is use to indicate whether or not the service has multicast capabilities.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the binding configures the service to have multicast capabilities.
Docs.value: if the service has multicast capabilities.; otherwise. The default is .
